content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences, but I can provide you with some information about the most popular brands regarding drawing and design on tablets. For artists and designers, the most recommended brands are Apple and Samsung. The Apple iPad Pro and Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 are popular choices for digital artists because of their larger screens, high-resolution displays, and compatibility with styluses such as the Apple Pencil and Samsung S-Pen. They are also equipped with powerful processors which enable running demanding design applications with ease. There are many other tablet models and brands designed for drawing and designing as well, so it's worth doing your research before making a final decision.
